properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT REPORT_NO , CLIENT_ID , COMMENTS , BOARD_TYPE , BOARD_NO , REPORT_ID , REPORT_REASON , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE FROM TB_REPORT JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (CLIENT_ID = MEM_EMAIL) WHERE MEM_STATUS = 'Y' ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET MEM_STATUS = 'N' WHERE MEM_NO =(SELECT MEM_NO FROM TB_REPORT JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (CLIENT_ID = MEM_EMAIL) WHERE REPORT_NO = ?)
